Reviews.Title: Worth Every Penny!!
Reviews.Author: P. DAVIE "Baked Bean"
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a device like this to fit my budget for a long time, and I finally found it. The ones I purchased from on ebay.com from China were a joke!! Cheaply made like a toy for $40.00. This one works perfectly and the only thing I can suggest is to buy the 32gb memory card and learn on youtube.com how to disable the annoying glowing blue + red lights when activated.

ProductInfo.Features:
Functions As A Regular Standalone Pir Motion Sensor
Works As A Covert Camera For Taking Video Images Onto Sd Card (not Included
Up To 16 Gb)
Records 1 Minute Per Motion Detection Event & Creates A File Name With Date & Time
With A 16 Gb Sd Card, Total Video Recording Time Is About 6 Hours
ProductInfo.Name: Securityman PIR-SD Pir Motion Sensor with Hidden Color Camera & Sd Recorder (White)
